INFERNO.Name: INFERNO
INFERNO.Examine: You flip through the pages. It's just a book.

PURGATORIO.Name: PURGATORIO
PURGATORIO.Examine: You flip through the pages. Hidden inside you find a MATCHBOX!

PARADISUM.Name: PARADISUM
PARADISUM.Examine: You flip through the pages. It's just a book.

GOULAINE.Name: GOULAINE
GOULAINE.Examine: It's a bottle of wine with the label 'Chateau de Goulaine'

RICASOLI.Name: RICASOLI
RICASOLI.Examine: It's a bottle of wine with the label 'Ricasoli'

CODORNIU.Name: CODORNIU
CODORNIU.Examine: It's a bottle of wine with the label 'Codorniu'

BUCKET.Name: BUCKET
BUCKET.Examine: It's a metal bucket that could hold a lot of water

MATCHBOX.Name: MATCHBOX
MATCHBOX.Examine: It's a match box for lighting candles

POKER.Name: POKER
POKER.Examine: It's a poker with the word 'Goulaine' engraved on it

FIREPLACE.Name: FIREPLACE
FIREPLACE.Examine: Behind the flames you see a BLUE KEY, but the fire is too hot to reach it. Sitting on the stone hearth is a POKER and a BUCKET.

PIPES.Name: PIPES
PIPES.Examine: There is an intricate array of water pipes.

CANDELABRA.Name: CANDELABRA
CANDELABRA.Examine: Dare is like candles and ting

FONT.Name: FONT
FONT.Examine: It's a stone FONT in the centre of the courtyard. The interior has purple stains as if it once held wine.

BOOKCASE.Name: BOOKCASE
BOOKCASE.Examine: It's a large bookcase stretchin from ceiling to floor and wall to wall.

WINERACK.Name: WINERACK
WINERACK.Examine: The WINERACK has many dusty bottles with different labels on them. Three vineyards standout to you: GOULAINE, RICASOLI and CODORNIU

CHEST.Name: CHEST
CHEST.Examine: It's a beautifully ornate golden CHEST. Inside you see a BLACK KEY!

BOX.Name: BOX
BOX.Examine: It's a manky old BOX. Inside you see a crumpled NOTE and a torn piece of MAP

TAPESTRY.Name: TAPESTRY
TAPESTRY.Examine: It's a beautiful depiction of Southern France. You look behind the TAPESTRY and see a crumpled NOTE

RUBBLE.Name: RUBBLE
RUBBLE.Examine: You search around the RUBBLE and see a torn piece of a MAP

PAINTING.Name: PAINTING
PAINTING.Examine: The painting shows two men fighting each other. You look behind the painting and see a torn piece of a MAP.
